par_segtext: @296a # // rgya gar skad du /
bo dhi sa tva ka rm'a di marg'a ba t'a ra de sha na /
bod skad du /
byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i lam la 'jug pa bstan pa /
bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

mngon mtho nges 'byung rtsol mdzad pa //

par_segtext: 'di na gang dag rang bzhin gyis snying rje dang
shes rab che ba theg pa chen po'i rigs can
dang / yang gang dag skye ba snga ma dag
tu theg pa chen po la goms par byas pa'i
dang / skyes bu / 'khor ba la yid legs par byung ba 'chi ba rjes su dran pa /
root_segtext: yaśca pūrvajanmasu mahāyānabhāvukaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsārasunirviṇṇacittaḥ maraṇānusmṛtikaśca samastabāhyādhyātmika-vastusvalpābhiniveśaḥ,
par_string: 'di na gang dag rang bzhin gyis snying rje dang shes rab che ba theg pa chen po'i rigs can dang / yang gang dag skye ba snga ma dag tu theg pa chen po la goms par byas pa'i dang / skyes bu / 'khor ba la yid legs par byung ba 'chi ba rjes su dran pa /

par_segtext: phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad la zhen pa chung ba dang /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa cig la theg pa
chen po'i lam phyin ci ma log pa cig thos
par gyur na ci ma rung /
root_segtext: yaśca pūrvajanmasu mahāyānabhāvukaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsārasunirviṇṇacittaḥ maraṇānusmṛtikaśca samastabāhyādhyātmika-vastusvalpābhiniveśaḥ,
ahamekaṃ santaṃ anveṣyāmi' - evaṃ cintayan saḥ kalyāṇamitrānurupaṃ gurumanviṣya anyatra nirdiṣṭavat triśaraṇagamanaviśiṣṭaḥ,
root_string: yaśca pūrvajanmasu mahāyānabhāvukaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsārasunirviṇṇacittaḥ maraṇānusmṛtikaśca samastabāhyādhyātmika-vastusvalpābhiniveśaḥ, 'ekasatkalyāṇamitrata ekāviparyastamārgaśravaṇe kiṃ na syāt?
par_string: phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad la zhen pa chung ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa cig la theg pa chen po'i lam phyin ci ma log pa cig thos par gyur na ci ma rung /

par_segtext: bdag gis dam pa cig btsal bar bya'o snyam du sems pa des /
dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rung ba'i bla ma btsal te /

par_string: bdag gis dam pa cig btsal bar bya'o snyam du sems pa des / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rung ba'i bla ma btsal te /

par_segtext: gzhan du bstan pa bzhin du gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can dang /
'gro ba mtha' yas pa yul du byas te bsam
pa bzang po dang ldan pas bla na med pa'i
byang chub chen por sems thun mong ma yin pa
bskyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po
root_segtext: ahamekaṃ santaṃ anveṣyāmi' - evaṃ cintayan saḥ kalyāṇamitrānurupaṃ gurumanviṣya anyatra nirdiṣṭavat triśaraṇagamanaviśiṣṭaḥ,
par_string: gzhan du bstan pa bzhin du gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can dang / 'gro ba mtha' yas pa yul du byas te bsam pa bzang po dang ldan pas bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por sems thun mong ma yin pa bskyed pa dang /

par_segtext: bskyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po
dang ldan pas g-yo sgyu dang bral ba'i 'jug pa
byang chub kyi sems chen pos /
byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa gsum legs par blang bar bya'o //
root_segtext: tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād ahorātraṃ kāya-vāk-cittasamastakarmāṇi na vyarthāni bhavanti /
par_string: lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po dang ldan pas g-yo sgyu dang bral ba'i 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems chen pos / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa gsum legs par blang bar bya'o //

par_segtext: de nas khyi dang gdol pa dang /
bran gyi 'du shes dang ldan pa /
g-yo sgyu dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de
tshogs kyi lam pa yin pas nyin dang mtshan du
lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba thams cad
don med par mi 'gyur ro //
root_segtext: tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād ahorātraṃ kāya-vāk-cittasamastakarmāṇi na vyarthāni bhavanti /
root_string: tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād ahorātraṃ kāya-vāk-cittasamastakarmāṇi na vyarthāni bhavanti /
par_string: de nas khyi dang gdol pa dang / bran gyi 'du shes dang ldan pa / g-yo sgyu dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de tshogs kyi lam pa yin pas nyin dang mtshan du lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba thams cad don med par mi 'gyur ro //

par_segtext: 'di ltar sems des zas tshod rig par bya ba dang /
dbang po'i sgo rnams bsdam pa dang /
kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang /
nyin dang mtshan du rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o //
root_segtext: tataḥ śvaśvapacadāsasaṃjñakasya māyāśāṭhyarahitasya tasya bodhisattvasya saṃbhāramārgīyatvād ahorātraṃ kāya-vāk-cittasamastakarmāṇi na vyarthāni bhavanti /
tataḥ śvāsapraśvāsamapi parārtham abhilaṣitukāmaḥ saḥ pañcamaprahara utthāya,
root_string: evaṃ tena cittena bhojanamātrājñānam, indriyadvārasaṃvaraṇam, aṇumātre 'pyavadye bhayadarśanam, aharniśaṃ yogañca āpādayet /
par_string: 'di ltar sems des zas tshod rig par bya ba dang / dbang po'i sgo rnams bsdam pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang / nyin dang mtshan du rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o //

rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa rnams la chos
